name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Field Engineer with over 10 years of experience in IT/Network diagnosis, remote service, and customer service. Skilled in problem-solving and preventative maintenance, with a strong background in imaging systems and diagnostic equipment for advanced applications such as Diagnostic X Ray and Image Guided Therapy. Demonstrated ability to collaborate with cross-functional teams and leverage technology to improve system performance. Proven track record of delivering high-quality solutions while working in challenging environments. Well-versed in backend development and cloud-native architectures with a technical proficiency in **Python (FastAPI, Django, Flask)** and cloud platforms like **AWS** and **Azure**, gained from impactful projects at leading organizations including VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska.
